title: bhaarathi dhEvi
sahitya:
bhArati dEvi vandiDuvAi Aya kalaigaL tandiDuvAi
shAradE vINayai mITiDuvAi
saptaswara jAlam kATiDuvAi   
(bhArati dEvi)

caraNam

Odi uNarndiDa unnaruL illaiyEl
mEdiniyil pugal EdammA ?
nAdam isaittiDa nAn marandAlum
nI en nAvil nadam seiyya vEndum ammA
nAn mugan nAyaki paNivErkaruL dAyaki
Agamam pugazh vAni jegan mOhana kalyANi  
 (bhArati dEvi)
